discussion: Super-command that hosts subcommands: morning (environment snapshot + detached timer + update today's note), day (midday check-in), and night (wind-down to agency triad plus optional update to tomorrow's note 'On deck').

subcommands.abstract: Morning ritual: print environment, start timer, update today’s note.
subcommands.name: morning

options.help: Render wake text in On Kawara style.
options.name: kawara-style

options.help: One-line news summary to record today.
options.name: news

options.help: Do not write to notes; print only.
options.name: no-note

subcommands.abstract: Midday check-in: print current heartbeat summary and optional note.
subcommands.name: day

options.help: Optional note to include in printed summary.
options.name: note

options.help: Agent slug to write to (default: auto)
options.name: slug

options.help: Append a concise check-in entry to agency triad (JSON).
options.name: append-agency

subcommands.abstract: Wind‑down: append to agency triad (JSON) and update tomorrow’s On deck.
subcommands.name: night

options.help: Nightly takeaway/inspirational note (logged to agency triad)
options.name: message

options.help: Agent slug to write to (default: auto)
options.name: slug

options.help: Also append a JSON journal entry for the active agent
options.name: append-journal

options.help: Directories touched (repeatable); stored as x-dirsTouched in journal
options.name: dirs-touched
